DataItem.DataItemDefinition: This Data Item allows for a more convenient handling of the messages at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

Bits.BitsValue: RIMCAS Arrival / Departure Wrong Runway Alert (WRA)
RIMCAS Arrival / Departure Opposite Traffic Alert (OTA)

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the Safety Nets server sending the message.
DataItem.DataItemNote: The up-to-date list of SACs is published on the EUROCONTROL web site (http://www.eurocontrol.int/asterix).

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of the SDPS providing data to the safety nets server.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive Data Item starting with one-octet Field Repitition Indicator (REP) followed by at least one SDPS identifier.

DataItem.DataItemNote: The up-to-date list of SACs is published on the EUROCONTROL web site (http://www.eurocontrol.int/asterix).

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Absolute time stamping of the message in the form of elapsed time since last midnight.
DataItem.DataItemNote: This time is given at an application level (e.g. time at which a message is filled), and not at the communication level (i.e. not the time at which the datablock containing the message is sent).

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of a track number related to conflict.
DataItem.DataItemNote: Bits 16/1 (track number): 0 to 65535. 1) This is the track number of the first track involved in the conflict in case of an STCA or a RIMCA or the track involved in case of one of the other Safety Net functions. 2) This track number is distributed in this field exactly as it was received from the Radar Processor Unit (identified by I004/015) and its range is depending on the range used by that unit.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Together with I004/030, this item defines the track pair in conflict.
DataItem.DataItemNote: 1) This is the track number of the second track involved in the conflict in case of an STCA or a RIMCA. 2) For the other Safety Net functions, this item is not used. 3) This track number is distributed in this field exactly as it was received from the Radar PRocessor Unit and its range is depending on the range used by that unit.

1) This item is the Alert Identification of the conflict in the system. 2) This number shall be assigned, by the Safety Net Server, incrementally to every new alert and restart on zero after reaching the maximum value (65535).

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Information concerning status of the alert.
DataItem.DataItemNote: The content of this item is implementation dependent.

DataItem.DataItemName: Safety Net Function and System Status
DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Status of the Safety Nets functions handled by the system.

DataItemFormat.desc: Variable length Data Item comprising a first part of one octet, followed by one-octet extents as necessary.

DataItem.DataItemNote: 1) This item only sent in "alive messages" to describe the status of the Safety Nets functions, handled by the system. 2) Value 0 means either that the function is not managed by the system or has failed. 3) Value 1 means that the function is managed by the system and is running well. 4) "Overflow" is defined as a situation where the number of alerts in the system has exceeded the threshold for safe operation. Potential prioritization of the alerts may lead to a loss of information. 6) "Overload" is defined as a system status in which the number of alerts does not allow for a reliable performance. A correct calculation and transmission cannot be guaranteed. 6) "System degraded" means that information from one or more sensors is lost.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Information on Timing and Aircraft Separation.

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of one octet, followed by the indicated subfields.

Bits.BitsName: Time remaining to actual conflict situation
Time to closest proximity between entities in conflict

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: longitudinal deviation for route adherence monitoring, in two's complement form.
DataItem.DataItemNote: Longitudinal deviation will be positive if the aircraft is ahead of its planned position. Longitudinal deviation will be negative if the aircraft is behind its planned position.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Transversal distance deviation for Route Adherence Monitoring, in two's complement form.
DataItem.DataItemNote: Clockwise deviation will be coded as a positive value. Anticlockwise deviation will be coded as a negative value.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Vertical Deviation from planned altitude, in two's complement form.
DataItem.DataItemNote: Positive value if aircraft is above planned altitude. Negative value if aircraft is below planned altitude.

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Definition of Areas involved in a Safety Net Alert.

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of one octet, followed by the indicated subfields.

Bits.BitsName: Name of Crossing Area involved in a RIMCA
Designator of Runway/Taxiway 1 involved in a RIMCA
Designator of Runway/Taxiway 1 involved in a RIMCA
Designator of Stop-Bar involved in a RIMCA
Gate Designator of the approaching aircraft in a RIMCA

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification of a list of FDPS Sector Control Positions in charge of the involved targets, as provided by the FDPS.

DataItemFormat.desc: Repetitive Data Item starting with one-octet Field Repetition Indicator (REP) followed by at least one FDPS Sector Control Position.

DataItem.DataItemNote: The Centre identification code and the Control position identification code must be defined between the communication partners.

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of one octet, followed by the indicated subfields.

Bits.BitsValue: Conflict not predicted to occur in military airspace
Conflict predicted to occur in military airspace
Conflict not predicted to occur in civil airspace
Conflict predicted to occur in civil airspace
Aircraft are not fast diverging laterally at current time
Aircraft are fast diverging laterally at current time
Aircraft are not fast diverging vertically at current time
Aircraft are fast diverging vertically at current time
Aircraft have not crossed at starting time of conflict
Aircraft have crossed at starting time of conflict
Aircraft are not diverging at starting time of conflict
Aircraft are diverging at starting time of conflict

Bits.BitsName: Identification of conflict categories definition table
STCA TableID=0000 conflict severity class; STCA TableID=0001 LPF Linear Prediction filter; RIMCAS TableId=0010 alert stage
STCA TableID=0000 conflict severity class; STCA TableID=0001 CPF Current Proximity filter
STCA TableID=0000 conflict severity class; STCA TableID=0001 MHF Manoeuvre Hazard filter

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification and Characteristics of Aircraft 1 involved in the Conflict.

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of up to two octets, followed by the indicated subfields.

Bits.BitsName: Aircraft Identifier of Aircraft 1 involved in the conflict
Mode-3/A code (converter to octal representation) of Aircraft 1 involved in the conflict
Latitude in WGS-84 in two's complement. Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.
Longitude in WGS-84 in two's complement. Range -180 <= longitude <= 180 deg.
Number of Flight Plan correlated to Aircraft 1 involved in the Conflict
Cleared Flight Level for Aircraft 1 involved in the Conflict

DataItem.DataItemDefinition: Identification and Characteristics of Aircraft 2 involved in the Conflict.

DataItemFormat.desc: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of up to two octets, followed by the indicated subfields.

Bits.BitsName: Aircraft Identifier of Aircraft 2 involved in the conflict
Mode-3/A code (converter to octal representation) of Aircraft 2 involved in the conflict
Latitude in WGS-84 in two's complement. Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.
Longitude in WGS-84 in two's complement. Range -180 <= longitude <= 180 deg.
Number of Flight Plan correlated to Aircraft 1 involved in the Conflict
Cleared Flight Level for Aircraft 2 involved in the Conflict
